pageContext.claim: “You know we had a rally three weeks ago in New Mexico and New Mexico is a hard state for Republicans, hasn't been won in a long time also, and we had receptivity that was unbelievable. The audience was 40% Hispanic where we're doing great.'
pageContext.analysis: George W. Bush, George H.W. Bush and Ronald Reagan all won New Mexico. The origin of Trump’s statistic about the racial makeup of the audience is not clear, but overall, according to a recent Washington Post-ABC poll, Trump’s support among Hispanic voters was roughly half of his overall national support.
